meanings.definition: To tell a lie or lies.
meanings.sent1: She mislies about her age to seem older.
meanings.sent2: He mislies to avoid getting in trouble.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat mislies about catching the mouse.
meanings.sent4: His smile mislies his true feelings of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The mirror mislies, showing a distorted reflection.

meanings.sent5: The bright colors mislie the true size of the room.
